participant_1.background:
I've seen a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska.
I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things.
I rent an apartment near my favorite sushi bar.
everyday i go swimming at the y.
i m a pilot for southwest.

participant_2.background:
I love to visit my mother in the afternoon and try on some of her shoes.
regular life disappoints me.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
i love to take walks.
I like to drive my Honda around, but I have to be careful not to get stung by bees.

content.text: Hello there! Hope you are doing well.
Hey hey, I'm doing alright! Thanks for asking. How are you?
Not bad, just got back from a swim. I'm a pilot for Southwest and I do some swimming to stay in shape.
That's really cool! I love to take walks, but I don't get out as much as I should.
I can relate. I used to be more active, but work has really taken over my life.
I feel you. I work from home, so I have to make an effort to get out and about.
That's tough. I'm lucky that I get to fly around the country and see new places.
That is really cool! I bet you get to see some amazing things.
I do! I've seen a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska.
That's incredible! I've never seen a whale in person.
They're really amazing creatures. I'm glad I got to see one.
I'm sure you're right. I'd love to see one someday.
Thanks for the tip! I'll definitely look into it.
